definition: The term "Sämtlich" refers to a word that is commonly used to describe a collection or group of things, typically indicating that all items within the group are included. It is often employed to emphasize the entirety or completeness of a set, encompassing every single element or member. This word is frequently utilized in formal or written contexts to convey a sense of comprehensiveness or inclusivity.

examples.english: All participants will receive a certificate.
